comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Billiards player, on January 5, 1914 challenged the defending champion Alfredo De Oro of New York in the National Three-Cushion Billiard Championships in New York City. Morin was defeated after 75 innings in the first match. New York Times item, January 6, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F01E5DD1730E7... De Oro defeated Morin again in the second match, on January 6, 1914. Item in New York Times, January 7, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9C05E5DF1E39E6...
